page.title: 19Transport
page.content: The main transport in Queensbury is traffic. In Queensbury there are four main roads leading to Halifax, Bradford, Denholme and Hipperholme.They get most accidents at the Raggalds Inn. The Fire Service comes from Odsal, Clayton, Scholemore, Great Horton, Little Horton, Buttershaw, Canterbury, Wibsey, Wyke and Lower Moor to cover Queensbury. The busiest time on Queensbury roads is 8am-9am in the morning and 4.30pm-6pm at night when people travel to and from work. There is 2 taxi services in Clayton and 2 bus services from Bradford and Halifax. There is one car dealer and 5 garages in Queensbury. There are no Traffic Wardens the Police do the job.
